!important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/5" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/5" css=".vc_custom_1488281263386{margin-top: -1px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][kleo_gap size="90px"][vc_custom_heading text="How we do it?" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:left|color:%23d2147d|line_height:44px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1488300633613{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_separator color="custom" align="align_left" el_width="20" css=".vc_custom_1488300681479{margin-top: 35px !important;margin-right: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;margin-left: 30px !important;}" accent_color="#d2147d"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1488280993357{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]The secret of the youth has been searched since long time ago. Many researchers have done some experiments to find ways to slow down the aging process. There are some techniques which have been implemented, but the most important things for us to do are being consistent in implementing healthy lifestyle and eating habits. We can’t stop the natural change, but we can still look younger if we want to work hard to slow down the aging process. Sleep – Having enough sleep at least 6-8 hours a day will make our skin healthier. Having a good sleep is also important because growth hormone is working during that time. It renews the old cell of our body, include the skin cell. Our skin will look fresh and young if we have enough sleep. Food – Eating healthy and safe food everyday will make our body fit, slim and also look younger. Try to eat more fish instead of red meat. [/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/5" css=".vc_custom_1488289899698{background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][kleo_gap size="190px" visibility="hidden-xs"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1488281003796{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]Fiber food, vegetables, fruits, and supplements are important food to consume. Drink less coffee and other caffeine beverages. Exercise – Through routine exercise, we will feel happier, energetic, and confident. It also increases our bone density and muscle which can make our body look 15-20 years younger. Beside aerobic, walking, and swimming, goes also to the gym to do lifting exercise. Relax – By trying to be relaxed, our face will look younger. Stress and worries appear on our face. If we can manage our stress and feel at peace, our face will look younger and attractive. Be Positive – A positive mind and affirmation we said can bring positive life to us. Negative thought tend to bring failure and make us look older and unattractive. Meditation is one way to make positive thoughts.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1488293649785{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/5" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][kleo_gap size="90px"][vc_single_image image="291" img_size="1400x930" visibility="hidden-xs"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="4/5" css=".vc_custom_1488280924679{margin-top: -1px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][vc_single_image image="68" img_size="full" alignment="center" full_width="yes"][kleo_gap][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1488293655263{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/5" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/5" css=".vc_custom_1488281263386{margin-top: -1px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1488281803303{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]Performance – Start to look at our performance. Is our body weight ideal for us? If not, try to fix that to the best ideal weight.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/5"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1488281810592{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]Also look to the skin, hair, nail and teeth. Those are important as they will show our age. Looks good and feels good will increase our performance.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1488293658648{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/5" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="4/5" css=".vc_custom_1488280935356{margin-top: -1px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][kleo_gap size="90px"][vc_custom_heading text="Yes You Can" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:left|color:%23d2147d|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1488300693497{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_separator color="custom" align="align_left" el_width="10" css=".vc_custom_1488300733681{margin-top: 35px !important;margin-right: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;margin-left: 30px !important;}" accent_color="#d2147d"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1488276174380{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]We’ve come a long way since our mothers straightened our hair with an iron and ironing board, and it has never been more evident than now. The Sedu hair straightener has revolutionized the way we straighten our hair and has proved that hair Sedu style is hair to be truly envious of. Sedu styling is also great for every type of hair imaginable. From fine, limp and damaged hair to coarse, thick ethnic hair, the Sedu hair straightener can be adjusted to suit your particular needs. This is possible because of the flat iron’s adjustable thermostat, which allows you to choose a heat setting that is perfect for you to achieve hair Sedu style. As you can see, there are many beautiful benefits associated with the Sedu styling. What are you waiting for? Why not see what the Sedu hair staightener can do for your look today.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="130px"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

!important;margin-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1488296827961{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]Whether you want to lose some weight and tone up, define your muscles or overcome your last marathon record, our coaches can help you. You can receive counseling including in the event of injury suffered or during physical rehabilitation. A personal trainer knows and fits workout for pregnant women and offers nutrition tips in the period after birth, to quickly return to fitness before pregnancy.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/5"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1488293598752{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/5" offset="vc_col-xs-12" css=".vc_custom_1488379805381{background-color: #1e1e1e !important;}"][vc_single_image image="300" img_size="400x400" alignment="right" full_width="yes"][vc_column_text text_color="#fafafa" font_size="20px" font_weight="bold"]Katya[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text text_color="#999999" font_size="13px"]Fitness instructor that specializes in Aerobics, Schwinn Cycling Level, Surface Free Training and Pilates[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="20px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/5" css=".vc_custom_1488294093299{margin-top: -1px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][vc_single_image image="297" img_size="768x502" alignment="center" full_width="yes"][kleo_gap][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1488296870854{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]Working with a personal trainer means constant motivation, strength and confidence that you can overcome your limits, turn your body and, ultimately, life. Moreover, the personal trainer will stay all the time at your disposal to help you execute the movements correctly and efficiently.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="20px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/5"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1488293585724{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/5" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/5" css=".vc_custom_1488293019682{margin-top: -1px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][kleo_gap size="30px" visibility="hidden-xs"][vc_custom_heading text="Motivation" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:left|color:%233b3b3b|line_height:34px" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1488296970776{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_separator color="black" align="align_left" el_width="20" css=".vc_custom_1449507313828{margin-top: 35px !important;margin-right: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;margin-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1488276174380{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]We’ve come a long way since our mothers straightened our hair with an iron and ironing board, and it has never been more evident than now. The Sedu hair straightener has revolutionized the way we straighten our hair and has proved that hair Sedu style is hair to be truly envious of. Sedu styling is also great for every type of hair imaginable. From fine, limp and damaged hair to coarse, thick ethnic hair, the Sedu hair straightener can be adjusted to suit your particular needs. This is possible because of the flat iron’s adjustable thermostat, which allows you to choose a heat setting that is perfect for you to achieve hair Sedu style. As you can see, there are many beautiful benefits associated with the Sedu styling. What are you waiting for? Why not see what the Sedu hair staightener can do for your look today.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner
